alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 25 at 1:46AM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero in the higher elevations and as low as 15 below zero in the valleys. * WHERE...In New York, Yates, Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung, Tompkins, Madison, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Wayne, Wyoming, and Lackawanna counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow is still possible in exposed areas.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
